'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Document}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Deciphering 

* You can decipher the notes in one of two ways, giving you [Deciphered notes](/decipheredNotes/):
** Free [Tama Watua](/tamaWatua/) using the key dropped by [Bipara](/bipara/), then ask him for a reward.
** Decipher it yourself with either [Alchemy](/alchemy/) 15, [History](/history/) 17, or [Intellect](/intellect/) 20.

== Acquisition ==

== Deciphering ==
* You can decipher the notes in one of two ways, giving you [[Deciphered notes]]:
** Free [[Tama Watua]] using the key dropped by [[Bipara]], then ask him for a reward.
** Decipher it yourself with either [[Alchemy]] 15, [[History]] 17, or [[Intellect]] 20.
